title: An ultra violet light meter
abstract: An instrument for measuring ultra violet radiation is described in this paper. The general plan of the meter is explained and a description of a small portable instrument is given. By means of proper choice of cells, as described in the paper, radiations of different desired frequencies may be measured.

authors.name: H. C. Rentschler
authors.affiliation: Research, Westinghouse Lamp Company, Bloomfield, N.J.
